mapper.select:
SELECT TRIM(t.menu_id) AS id, TRIM(t.father_menu_id) AS pid, TRIM(t.menu_name) AS name,
image, 'd' AS nodeType FROM `t_ucenter_ms_menu` t
AND t.menu_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{menuType},'%')
AND father_menu_id =#{menuId}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT m.menu_name AS menuName, m.menu_id AS menuId, CONCAT(m.namespace,':',b.method) AS namespace, m.menu_url AS menuUrl , m.father_menu_id AS fatherMenuId FROM t_ucenter_ms_menu m LEFT JOIN t_ucenter_ms_menu_permission b ON b.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE m.`namespace` IS NOT NULL AND m.`namespace` !='' AND m.`is_enable` = 0 AND b.`is_enable` = 0 ORDER BY m.father_menu_id,m.order_index ) m WHERE m.`namespace` IS NOT NULL

mapper.select: SELECT menu_id AS menuId, menu_name AS menuName, father_menu_id AS fatherMenuId, menu_url AS menuUrl, namespace, menu_type AS menuType, is_enable AS isEnable, image, server_name_id AS serverNameId, order_index AS orderIndex, namespace, check_help_url AS checkHelpUrl, menu_state AS menuState, configuration_home_menu AS configurationHomeMenu, system_id AS systemId FROM `t_ucenter_ms_menu` WHERE menu_id=#{menuId}

CONCAT(s.`server_url`,m.menu_url)AS menuUrl, m.namespace, m.menu_type AS menuType, m.is_enable AS isEnable, image, m.server_name_id AS serverNameId, system_id AS systemId, order_index AS orderIndex,
